dict.string: This block is dedicated to solving conflicts in your relationship. By answering these questions, you can deal with specific conflict situations in your relationship.
[again]To maintain and support trust in your relationship after a conflict, follow the rules that both of you agreed on during the discussion.

array.string: What situation do we want to solve now?
Which my actions caused the wish to communicate less / not to communicate at all?
How did this situation affect trust in our relationship?
Did I cross your personal boundaries in this conflict? How do you feel about it?
How should I act in similar situations in future so I won`t hurt your feelings and cross your boundaries?
What rules can we set so to make us more comfortable in communication? (if possible - write them on a sheet of paper)
Did we manage to solve this conflict and are we satisfied with its solution?

dict.string: This block is dedicated to help you to go through the tough period of your relationship, when difficult circumstances such as illness / death of a loved one, loss / change of work, etc. occurred in your or your partner/friend/relative life.
Express support for each other as you have discussed during this block. Remember: tough period will will end, but relationships could last if you`re commited to them.

array.string: What situation has affected our relationship?
When do you feel the closest to me?
What resources can help us to overcome this period of our lives?
What can we do to go through hard times together?
How can we express support for each other right now?
What plan can we set so our relationship will overcome this time? (if possible- write it on a sheet of paper)

dict.string: This block is devoted to the period of alienation when the distance between partners/friends/relatives in a relationship gradually increases.
In order to reduce the distance between you - follow the plan. Remember that your conversation is the first step for returning the relationship you used to have.

array.string: Do we know what specifically influenced our relationship?
Which of my actions caused the wish to communicate less / not to communicate at all?
Is it hard for you sometimes to take love or care from me? Why?
What exactly do we want to return in our relationship?
Have you thought how can we try to return what we`ve mentioned?
Can we make an action plan of how can we return what we miss in our relationship back? (if possible - so scss write it down on a sheet of paper)

dict.string: This block is devoted to the stage when both of you understand that the format of your relationship has changed recently and you should find a new form for it.
In order for new status of your relationship not to destroy your communication, think about your overall comfort using what was said during your conversation.

array.string: On a scale from 1 to 10, rate how happy are you in this relationship (where 10 - a feeling of complete happiness, and 1 - complete dissatisfaction)
What new factors and circumstances appeared in our relationship?
How did these circumstances affect us and our relationship?
What is the status of our relationship now? How can we call it?
How do we understand this status and how do we feel about it?
What can we do for our mutual comfort with this status?

dict.string: This block will help not to leave misunderstanding between two of you when you both understand that to finish the relationship is the right decision for now.
[menu]Remember that each finish is a new start. If you want to transform your relationship - go to other blocks of questions.

array.string: What was your role in my life? Have you fulfilled it?
How did you feel when you thought about the complete (or partial) stop in our communication?
How can a pause in communication affect our relationship?
What are you the most grateful for in our relationship?
What advice can you give me to become better in next relationship/friendship?
